verses.roman:
jala-śāyī antar-yāmī yei nārāyaṇa
seho tomāra aṁśa, tumi mūla nārāyaṇa

synonyms: jala-śāyī—lying in the water; antaḥ-yāmī—indwelling Supersoul; yei—He who; nārāyaṇa—Lord Nārāyaṇa; seho—He; tomāra—Your; aṁśa—plenary portion; tumi—You; mūla—original; nārāyaṇa—Nārāyaṇa.
translation: The manifestation of the Nārāyaṇa who predominates in everyone's heart, as well as the Nārāyaṇa who lives in the waters [Kāraṇa, Garbha and Kṣīra], is Your plenary portion. You are therefore the original Nārāyaṇa.
